'''House Errol''' is a vassal house from [[the Stormlands]] that holds fealty to [[House Baratheon]]. Their seat is [[Haystack Hall]] and their sigil is a yellow haystack on an orange field.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Errol's history is the same.
sections.History:
===[[Season 2]]===
House Errol, along with most noble houses of the Stormlands, pledge support to [[Renly Baratheon]]'s claim to the [[Iron Throne]]. Following the [[Assassination of Renly I|death]] of Renly, the Errols go over to [[Stannis Baratheon|Stannis]] and participate in the [[Battle of the Blackwater]].<ref>Season 2 Bluray: War of the Five Kings feature</ref>
